definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)
curdled milk or fruit juice/also pr. [luo4]

sentences.chinese: 那乾酪是重口味的《切達》。

sentences.english: Slice up cucumbers and tomatoes and mix together with a cup of low-fat cottage cheese.
sentences.chinese: 切片黃瓜和西紅柿，混合的和低脂鬆軟乾酪杯在一起。

sentences.english: Buttermilk is added to soups and certain cheeses ;
sentences.chinese: 白脫牛奶備添加在湯或乾酪裏面。

sentences.english: I gave away a block of cheddar cheese with crumbled bacon in it.
sentences.chinese: 我還放棄了一塊切達乾酪，裏面還有切碎的培根肉。

sentences.english: I'd like a cheeseburger to take away, please.
sentences.chinese: 勞駕，我想買走一個乾酪漢堡包。

sentences.english: The best-tasting cheeses are made from unpasteurized (raw) milk.
sentences.chinese: 利用未殺菌的乳做成的乾酪其風味較好。

sentences.english: After both sides are fried to a golden brown, add tomato sauce and Parmesan cheese.
sentences.chinese: 茄子兩面都變成焦黃色之後，加入番茄醬和巴馬乾酪。

sentences.english: I did as instructed and put the pill inside the veggie cheese.
sentences.chinese: 我照章辦事，將藥片混在素食乾酪裏面。

sentences.english: The holes in Gruyere are due to aeration.
sentences.chinese: 格律耶爾乾酪氣孔多是由於通風所致。

sentences.english: Typical organic constituents of kerogen are algae and woody plant material.
sentences.chinese: 乾酪根的典型有機組分爲藻類和木質植物。

sentences.english: I'm going to breakfast an egg-white omelet with vegetable and cheddar filling.
sentences.chinese: 我早飯要喫裏面帶蔬菜和乾酪餡的煎蛋清卷。

sentences.english: Tectonic activities and volcanism in the basin have an influence on hydrocarbon generation of kerogen and its change.
sentences.chinese: 盆地構造活動和火山作用可以促進乾酪根的成烴轉化。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and the treatment of caseous lobar pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討大葉性乾酪性肺炎的診斷與方法。

sentences.english: If cheerful Charlie chose a cheesy chowder.
sentences.chinese: 如果快樂的查裏選擇乾酪海鮮湯了。

sentences.english: All right. We'll have some cheese wafers and caviar.
sentences.chinese: 我們點一些乾酪薄脆餅和魚子醬。

sentences.english: Rich in calcium, Casein helps contribute to milk's white color.
sentences.chinese: 富含鈣質的乾酪素對牛奶呈現白色起到一定作用。
